pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 2, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 2, 2018:

Barrie, Ontario

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a discussion with students from Georgian College and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2018â€™s Pay Equity policy. A media availability will follow.

Georgian College
1 Georgian Drive

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and present themselves to room A138, located in Building A (Centre for Sustainable Technologies)
  • Photo opportunity of the Environmental Technology Lab
  • Open coverage of the media availability

Media appearances

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Rock 95 FM at 4 p.m. and on 107.5 Kool FM at 5 p.m.
  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV Barrie at 6 p.m.
